Title: Bass Guitar Trainer
Description: Bass Guitar Trainer is a free application for mastering a bass guitar.  Application contains also metronome and drum machine
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Bass Guitar Trainer is a free application for mastering a bass guitar. Application contains also metronome and drum machine

Bass Guitar Trainer is a free application for mastering a bass guitar. This application is a easy way to learn music notation, notes positions on the fretboard. Application contains also metronome with standard or custom time signatures and a drum machine which can fake real percussion with full set of drums and hi-hats.

Main Features

Bass trainer


  • Real bass guitar player
  • Set of Excercises
    • Find note position on fretboard by its notation
    • Find note position on freatboard by its name or sound
    • Recognize intervals by its sound or degree name
    • Recognize name of note by its notation
  • Statistics for each excercise

Metronome


  • Time Signature
  • Full Screen Mode
  • Set of different samples
  • Custom bpm from 20 to 320

Drum machine


  • Custom bpm
  • Time signature or custom settings
  • Full set of drums and hi-hats
  • GUI Pattern programming
